ComicInfo.Penciller: Ryan Ottley,E. J. Su,E. J. Su,Ryan Ottley
ComicInfo.Title: "Unnngh... Never been hit like that..."[Tech Jacket Chapter 4 of 8]
ComicInfo.Summary: VILTRUMITE WAR CONTINUES! The traitor is revealed as the Viltrumite Empire's Grand Regent Thragg launches a full-scale assault on the Coalition of Planets home base on Talescria. It appears that all is lost, but the Coalition isn't going to go down without a fight.
